channel.title: Help (rep++)
channel.description:
As of now when I spawn any of the Godwars bosses on my server, they are a flying ore that you cant attack. What i'm looking to do is change it from the ore, to a bandit (just an example) Any ideas on how to do this?
EDIT: What would be even better is if I could add the models for the bosses... don't know how to do that either :(
